title: invisible chat
body: hey when i start a game and press enter the chat doesn't appear but i an still type in it and i can hear people chating but i cant see the chat... does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
Hello Keima!

Fortunately, I can provide you a quick an easy fix in order to resolve this issue!  This should force your entire in-game chat to reset, allowing your Chat window to appear in its default location.  Follow these steps very carefully:

Navigate to the following location of your League of Legends installation:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\[Latest Release Version]\deploy\DATA\menu\hud

Once inside the "hud" folder, you should see several different files, such as chat.ini.  Make sure to completely delete all of these files found in this folder.

The next time that you load into a game of League of Legends, your chat box should appear normally!  If you are still unable to see it, even after double-checking you completed these steps properly, then please do not hesitate to let me know!

I followed your instructions but in the DATA folder there was no Menu folder or Hud folder/file.

Is there any other way ? I have re-downloaded league about 3 times and repaired it about 4 times and still nothing.
